alert.note: Alert for South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 1:13AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Aitkin, northwestern Pine and southwestern Carlton Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Cromwell, to 7 miles west of Kettle River, to 7 miles southeast of Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area, to near Malmo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Barnum, Kettle River and McGrath around 130 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mahtowa, Moose Lake and Nemadji. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Minnesota.
